[[File:RazorFang.png|thumb|200px|The Razor Fang]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Razor Fang costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Sinnoh:_Locations_and_items|Pal Park]] in [[Sinnoh]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | [[File:Gligar.png|40px]] Gligar || | Gliscor |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
